Atlantean.name: Atlantean
Atlantean.description: The character can breathe under water and they swimming speed is equal to their Movement +2m/AP.

Alzawahif.name: Alzawahif
Alzawahif.description: The character becomes invisible when they stops moving. +20 in Misdemeanor checks to hide in that case.

Isbjorn.name: Isbjorn
Isbjorn.description: The character heals 1 HP per turn.

Raiz.name: Raiz
Raiz.description: The character can communicate with the fauna and the flora.

Kanshojin.name: Kanshojin
Kanshojin.description: The character can fly at its Movement.

Caniae.name: Caniae
Caniae.description: The character has a very developed sense of smell, allowing them to perfectly remember smells and trace them. (+3 in all checks where odor is involved)

Waniama.name: Waniama
Waniama.description: The character has +2 m/AP to its Movement.

Ukher.name: Ukher
Ukher.description: The character becomes enraged when below 50% max HP, granting him +1 AP regeneration.

Undead.name: Undead
Undead.description:
Radiant healing hurt the character but necrotic damage heal them.
The character is weak to blunt damage and resists to piercing damage.
The character is immune to all Constitution saves but has a disadvantage against all mental effects saves.
The character's health is based on their Resilience.
